abstract_summ: Sleep is a vital behavioral state of living beings and a modulator of immune function and responsiveness . Shiftworkers show increased risk for developing viral infections due to possible compromise of both innate and acquired immunity responses . Home quarantine due to COVID-19 pandemic has a detrimental impact on sleep quality . Online interventions including self-help sleep programs, stress management, relaxation practices, stimulus control, sleep hygiene, and mindfulness training are available interventions .
